snippet: The snow continues to fall, we’re in the middle of a winter boot shortage and New Yorkers on Twitter and elsewhere are talking about a sensitive topic: Is it O.K. to use umbrellas in the snow?
abstract: The snow continues to fall, we’re in the middle of a winter boot shortage and New Yorkers on Twitter and elsewhere are talking about a sensitive topic: Is it O.K. to use umbrellas in the snow?

byline.original: By EBA HAMID and DANIEL VICTOR

headline.main: When New Yorkers Use Umbrellas During Snowstorms
